alert.note: Alert for Aiken; Barnwell (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 8:39PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Richmond, northwestern Barnwell and west central Aiken Counties through 915 PM EDT... At 838 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Clearwater, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Aiken, North Augusta, Clearwater, Aiken Mall, Belvedere, New Ellenton, USC Aiken, Citizens Park, Gloverville, Graniteville, Burnettown, Hopeland Gardens, Redcliffe Plantation State Historic Site, Boyd Pond Park and Beech Island. This includes Interstate 520 in South Carolina near mile marker 16, and between mile markers 20 and 22. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
